name: Crazy Expressions
description: A lora born of my irritation with the lack of the AI's ability to output truly insane or traumatized looking characters. I recommend for most use cases you refer to the "constricted pupils" tag followed by a facial expression. Check out "About This Version" for more details.

modelVersions.name: Constricted Pupils V3
modelVersions.description:
Entirely retrained on 100 images. Version notes are as follows:

  • No longer generates random mask parts and stuff. Should work better when blended with other LORAs now. I think.

  • May have a tendency to lower detail in the overall image, try to use mid to high weights.

  • Inpaint tested, need only highlight the eyes now.

  • With this version, there are only two trigger token: "constricted pupils, small pupils"

If you experience any issues with this version, I recommend downgrading or you can also try https://civitai.com/models/48579/yameroyandere

modelVersions.name: Crazy Expressions
modelVersions.description:
Trained on a self-curated dataset of 82 images. I recommend for most use cases you refer to the "constricted pupils" tag followed by a facial expression. You may also notice that the pupils glow sometimes, which is probably a side effect of the training, but it actually works in it’s favor.

Inpaint testing was tried. Only when I inpainted the whole face did it work.
